title: Worst Internet NA?
body:
Correct me if I'm wrong, but I'm pretty sure 371 kb/s download and ping that ranges from 150-10k could possibly be the worst internet in this country. 

{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
I don't really think it's a hardware issue going on here. It seems like the wifi might be causing this issue here with that download and ping. 

I would highly suggest trying a wired connection instead and see if that improves anything. And if that doesn't work, then try [flushing your DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq10) with this connection guide.

If that guide doesn't work out, our Tech team can still provide some additional solutions in a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
So its just your PC, then?
What are you system specs/hardware (wireless/ethernet lan card wise)? Or does this happen through out other devices or is it just League of Legends alone?
Origin PC, Intel Core i5-6500 CPU 3.20GHz, 8 GB RAM, 64 bit, and wireless.
Time to stop living on grandmas phone line.
That's the thing its not DSL.
